entry.title: Heavy Rain Warning - Orange
entry.summary: Expect 40 to 80 mm of rain, especially in the ranges, on top of what has already fallen. Peak rates of 15 to 25 mm/h, but 25 to 40 mm/h in possible thunderstorms with localised downpours. Impact: Streams and rivers may rise rapidly. Surface flooding, slips, and difficult driving conditions possible. Chance of upgrading to a Red Warning: Low.

entry.title: Heavy Rain Warning - Orange
entry.summary: Expect 20 to 40 mm of rain, especially in the ranges, on top of what has already fallen. Peak rates of 5 to 10 mm/h. Impact: Streams and rivers may rise rapidly. Surface flooding, slips, and difficult driving conditions possible. Chance of upgrading to a Red Warning: Minimal. Changes: The chance of upgrade for this Orange Warning decreased to Minimal.
